oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lookout Mountain Hotel, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A published photo from the Nashville Times (1940), of the Lookout Mountain Hotel on top of Lookout Mountain, Chattanooga, Tennessee. Touted as the "Castle in the Clouds," the Lookout Mountain Hotel was built in 1928 for almost $1.5 million. With 200 rooms offering incredible views of Lookout Valley, the property, once a popular tourist destination, is now Covenant College. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
